summary: Soledad Mexia  was a Mexican-American supercentenarian who at the time of her death was the world's fifth-oldest living person and the oldest living resident of California.
full_text: Soledad Mexia  was a Mexican-born American supercentenarian who at the time of her death was the world's sixth-oldest living person and the oldest living resident of California. She was also the oldest verified Mexican-born person ever, until being surpassed by Dominga Velasco on May 30, 2015.
title: Soledad Mexia
